Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The resulting optimal P-channel transistors demonstrate high hole mobilities of 0.43 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 for PzNDTDTBT and 0.34 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 for PzNDTBTBO.

Let's think step by step.

Material Name
---
PzNDTDTBT
PzNDTBTBO

The two material names mentioned in the paragraph are "PzNDTDTBT" and "PzNDTBTBO". They are both organic semiconductors used in the fabrication of P-channel transistors.

PzNDTBTBO

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The resulting optimal P-channel transistors demonstrate high hole mobilities of 0.43 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 for PzNDTDTBT and 0.34 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 for PzNDTBTBO.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high hole mobilities |
| 0.43 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (for PzNDTDTBT) |
| 0.34 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (for PzNDTBTBO) |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

* high hole mobilities
* 0.43 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (with the qualification "for PzNDTDTBT")
* 0.34 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (with the qualification "for PzNDTBTBO")

These entities are properties of the P-channel transistors that were studied. The first entity, "high hole mobilities", is a general property of the transistors. The second and third entities are specific values of the hole mobility property for two different types of P-channel transistors. These specific values are presented as measurements in the units of "cm^2 V -1 s^-1". The qualifications "for PzNDTDTBT" and "for PzNDTBTBO" are included to specify which type of transistor the measurements apply to.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high hole mobilities |
| 0.43 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |
| 0.34 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to "Material property" are:

* high hole mobilities
* 0.43 cm^2 V -1 s^-1
* 0.34 cm^2 V -1 s^-1

These entities are properties of the materials that make up the P-channel transistors that were studied. The first entity, "high hole mobilities", is a general property of the materials. The second and third entities are specific values of the hole mobility property for two different types of materials used in the transistors. These specific values are presented as measurements in the units of "cm^2 V -1 s^-1".

The qualifications "for PzNDTDTBT" and "for PzNDTBTBO" were removed because they refer to the transistors, not the materials. The hole mobility property is a property of the materials, not the transistors, so the qualifications are not relevant to the identification of material properties.
